title: 帮忙打包github上的一个mod
author: qq790716365
txt_content: https://github.com/ZekerZhayard/OptiForge 这是地址 类似于1.14光影兼容的mod 想试试能不能用 可是这上面是源码 不会弄 大佬们帮帮忙

replies.author: xmdhs
replies.txt_content:
这个东西真的厉害。


不过作者搞这么麻烦应该是顾虑版权，所以请你下载后玩玩就自行删除吧。

链接: https://pan.baidu.com/s/1Na9wKhgOV4wBvRcoBYOW4Q 提取码: 2rtc

replies.author: 阴阳师元素祭祀
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 阴阳师元素祭祀 于 2019-8-5 22:35 编辑 

https://codeload.github.com/ZekerZhayard/OptiForge/zip/1.14.4根据md内容
操作即可
https://github.com/MinecraftForge/MCPConfig/archive/master.zip

Download OptiFine_1.14.4_HD_U_F3_pre2.
Run OptiFine jar you just downloaded.
Select .minecraft folder which contains Minecraft 1.14.4 and click Extract button.
Download this repositry and unzip it.
Move the OptiFine jar file which was just extracted and the vanilla Minecraft jar file (.minecraft/versions/1.14.4/1.14.4.jar) to libs folder
Download MCPConfig and unzip it.
Run the command ./gradlew 1.14.4:makeSRG in MCPConfig.
Move build/versions/1.14.4/data/joined.srg to libs folder and rename it to 1.14.4.srg
Modify minecraftVersion and optifineJarName in gradle.properties
Run the command ./gradlew build in this repository.
You will get the special OptiFine jar in output folder and you can install it as a Forge mod.

这并不是一个mod
这是一个工具repo来帮忙build

replies.author: qq790716365
replies.txt_content:
xmdhs 发表于 2019-8-5 22:16
